about_the_game:
add new 6 puzzles

( FLAC / MP3 ( 44.1kHz 320kbps ) / album image include )

-- track list

01. Dear. sua
02. Dear. mimiru
03. Dear. Arin
04. Deep Forest
05. Bamboo Forest
06. Sunnyside
07. Stag Beetle Chip
08. Fox Diary
09. Unknown village
10. Stag Beetle Waltz
11.Brave Heart
12.Misty
13. Mystic
14.Shady Tail
15. Forest of Ruins
16. Showdown
17. Battlefield
18.Last moment
19. sentimental cry
20. The Fox Rain (Piano Ver.)
21.The Fox Rain (Orchestra Ver.)
22.MEDETASHI

25. VOCAL FOX'S DREAM
26.INST Fox's Dream

----------------------------------------

구매한 앨범 보는 방법

1. 테일즈퍼즐을 설치
2. DLC를 구매
3. 테일즈샵 퍼즐을 실행
4. 왼쪽 위의 앨범 버튼을 클릭
5. 구매한 앨범을 클릭
6. 오른쪽 상단에 폴더로 가기 클릭

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® XP or higher
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 3 or higher
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 32MB or greater graphics card
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound
